thread.title: Kentucky Derby Ladies Hats Website Partnership

title: Kentucky Derby Ladies Hats Website Partnership
text: Questions Business Summary Talented Webmaster with over 18 years experience working online. seeking a sharp international business man to partner with on a profitable ecommerce project. I can run the internet side of things, you can handle the financial aspects and together we will be a unstoppable. I am located in the US. Currently, this is a one man business run by Samuel who started it more than 25 years ago. The price was $240,000 but they took out the brick and mortar portion to reflect current lower price. The adjusted Owner's Net should be $166,750. This is a great business with a huge email list with loyal repeat customers. For more information contact me today. This opportunity won't last long. Financials
